title: Fusion Cuisines
typeOfFood: Lacto, Fast food, Asian, Fusion, Malaysian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of a foodhive food court underneath the GTower Building, this one is called Fusion Cuisines. Has a small vegetarian menu which is mostly vegan. Uses mock meats. No English. Vegan choices include sweet & sour vege chicken with rice, sweet & sour vege fish with rice, vege curry chicken & potato with rice, vegetable pineapple glazed vege lamb with rice.
